3-4 is 4 LBs.  the formula is (down linemen - linebackers)
linebacker: http://menofthescarletandgray.com/wp-content/uploads/james_laurinaitis.jpg
Depends on your strengths as well. 4-3 is reliant on strong defensive ends(DE) to get to the QB, and a very solid Middle Linebacker(MLB) to be the man who gets to the running back.

I feel like this topic will enable the dawn of my football understanding.
3 down linemen, and 4 linebackers is a 3-4 defense.  and it looks like this: http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/37/3-4_green.svg/275px-3-4_green.svg.png
3-4 favors teams with more lateral mobility.  4-3 (4 down, 3 linebackers) favors teams with more forward mobility, be it from strength or technique
